TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Stopwatch extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一组方法和属性，可用于准确地测量运行时间。

span.span: Provides a set of methods and properties that you can use to accurately measure elapsed time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例可以度量一个间隔的运行时间, 或度量多个间隔内所用时间的总和。A instance can measure elapsed time for one interval, or the total of elapsed time across multiple intervals. 在典型的方案中, 调用方法 , 最后调用方法, 然后使用属性检查运行时间。In a typical scenario, you call the method, then eventually call the method, and then you check elapsed time using the property. 实例正在运行或已停止; 用于确定的当前状态。 A instance is either running or stopped; use to determine the current state of a . 用于开始测量运行时间; 使用停止测量运行时间。Use to begin measuring elapsed time; use to stop measuring elapsed time. 通过属性、 或查询运行时间值。Query the elapsed time value through the properties , , or . 当实例正在运行或已停止时, 可以查询运行时间属性。You can query the elapsed time properties while the instance is running or stopped. 运行的时间属性在运行时将持续增加; 当实例停止时, 属性将保持不变。The elapsed time properties steadily increase while the is running; they remain constant when the instance is stopped. 默认情况下, 实例的运行时间值等于所有测量的时间间隔的总计。By default, the elapsed time value of a instance equals the total of all measured time intervals. 每次调用都会在累计运行时间进行计数; 每次调用都将结束当前间隔度量, 并冻结累计运行时间值。Each call to begins counting at the cumulative elapsed time; each call to ends the current interval measurement and freezes the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用方法清除现有实例中的累计运行时间。 Use the method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in an existing instance. 通过计算基础计时器机制中的计时器刻度来度量经过的时间。The measures elapsed time by counting timer ticks in the underlying timer mechanism. 如果安装的硬件和操作系统支持高分辨率性能计数器, 则类将使用该计数器来测量运行时间。If the installed hardware and operating system support a high-resolution performance counter, then the class uses that counter to measure elapsed time. 否则, 类将使用系统计时器来测量运行时间。Otherwise, the class uses the system timer to measure elapsed time. 使用和字段确定计时实现的精度和解决方法。Use the and fields to determine the precision and resolution of the timing implementation. 类可帮助在托管代码中操作与计时相关的性能计数器。The class assists the manipulation of timing-related performance counters within managed code. 具体而言, 可以使用字段和方法代替非托管的 Windows api `QueryPerformanceFrequency`和`QueryPerformanceCounter`。Specifically, the field and method can be used in place of the unmanaged Windows APIs `QueryPerformanceFrequency` and `QueryPerformanceCounter`. > [!NOTE] > 在多处理器计算机上, 线程在哪个处理器上运行并不重要。On a multiprocessor computer, it does not matter which processor the thread runs on. 但是, 由于 BIOS 或硬件抽象层 (HAL) 中的 bug, 你可以在不同的处理器上获取不同的计时结果。However, because of bugs in the BIOS or the Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL), you can get different timing results on different processors. 若要为线程指定处理器关联, 请使用方法。To specify processor affinity for a thread, use the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类来确定应用程序的执行时间。The following example demonstrates how to use the class to determine the execution time for an application. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用类来计算性能数据。The following example demonstrates the use of the class to calculate performance data. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的实例已停止, 并且该实例的运行时间属性为零。The returned instance is stopped, and the elapsed time property of the instance is zero. 使用方法, 开始测量新实例所用的时间。 Use the method to begin measuring elapsed time with the new instance. 使用方法初始化新的实例, 并立即启动该实例。 Use the method to initialize a new instance and immediately start it. ## Examples 下面的示例使用简单的类构造函数初始化实例。The following example initializes a instance by using a simple class constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Elapsed As TimeSpan
public: property TimeSpan Elapsed { TimeSpan get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前实例测量得出的总运行时间。

span.span: Gets the total elapsed time measured by the current instance.

value.span: 一个只读的 ，用于表示当前实例测量得出的总运行时间。

span.span: A read-only representing the total elapsed time measured by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在典型的方案中, 调用方法 , 最后调用方法, 然后使用属性检查运行时间。In a typical scenario, you call the method, then eventually call the method, and then you check elapsed time using the property. 使用属性可检索使用方法和属性的运行时间值。 Use the property to retrieve the elapsed time value using methods and properties. 例如, 可以将返回的实例格式化为文本表示形式, 或将其传递给需要参数的另一个类。For example, you can format the returned instance into a text representation, or pass it to another class that requires a parameter. 可以在 实例正在运行或已停止时查询属性、和。You can query the properties , , and while the instance is running or stopped. 运行的时间属性在运行时将持续增加; 当实例停止时, 属性将保持不变。The elapsed time properties steadily increase while the is running; they remain constant when the instance is stopped. 默认情况下, 实例的运行时间值等于所有测量的时间间隔的总计。By default, the elapsed time value of a instance equals the total of all measured time intervals. 每次调用都会在累计运行时间进行计数; 每次调用都将结束当前间隔度量, 并冻结累计运行时间值。Each call to begins counting at the cumulative elapsed time; each call to ends the current interval measurement and freezes the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用方法清除现有实例中的累计运行时间。 Use the method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in an existing instance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定应用程序的执行时间。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the execution time for an application. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ElapsedMilliseconds As Long
public: property long ElapsedMilliseconds { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前实例测量得出的总运行时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: Gets the total elapsed time measured by the current instance, in milliseconds.

value.span: 一个只读长整型，表示当前实例测量得出的总毫秒数。

span.span: A read-only long integer representing the total number of milliseconds measured by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示将运行时间向下舍入到最接近的整数毫秒值。This property represents elapsed time rounded down to the nearest whole millisecond value. 对于更高的精度度量, 使用或属性。For higher precision measurements, use the or properties. 可以在 实例正在运行或已停止时查询属性、和。You can query the properties , , and while the instance is running or stopped. 运行的时间属性在运行时将持续增加; 当实例停止时, 属性将保持不变。The elapsed time properties steadily increase while the is running; they remain constant when the instance is stopped. 默认情况下, 实例的运行时间值等于所有测量的时间间隔的总计。By default, the elapsed time value of a instance equals the total of all measured time intervals. 每次调用都会在累计运行时间进行计数; 每次调用都将结束当前间隔度量, 并冻结累计运行时间值。Each call to begins counting at the cumulative elapsed time; each call to ends the current interval measurement and freezes the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用方法清除现有实例中的累计运行时间。 Use the method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in an existing instance. ## Examples 下面的示例使用类来测量四个不同实现的性能, 用于分析字符串中的整数。The following example uses the class to measure the performance of four different implementations for parsing an integer from a string. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ElapsedTicks As Long
public: property long ElapsedTicks { long get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取当前实例测量得出的总运行时间（用计时器计时周期表示）。

span.span: Gets the total elapsed time measured by the current instance, in timer ticks.

value.span: 一个只读长整型，表示当前实例测量得出的计时器计时周期的总数。

span.span: A read-only long integer representing the total number of timer ticks measured by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示基础计时器机制中经过的计时周期数。This property represents the number of elapsed ticks in the underlying timer mechanism. 勾选标记是计时器可度量的最小时间单位。A tick is the smallest unit of time that the timer can measure. 使用字段将值转换为秒数。 Use the field to convert the value into a number of seconds. 可以在 实例正在运行或已停止时查询属性、和。You can query the properties , , and while the instance is running or stopped. 运行的时间属性在运行时将持续增加; 当实例停止时, 属性将保持不变。The elapsed time properties steadily increase while the is running; they remain constant when the instance is stopped. 默认情况下, 实例的运行时间值等于所有测量的时间间隔的总计。By default, the elapsed time value of a instance equals the total of all measured time intervals. 每次调用都会在累计运行时间进行计数; 每次调用都将结束当前间隔度量, 并冻结累计运行时间值。Each call to begins counting at the cumulative elapsed time; each call to ends the current interval measurement and freezes the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用方法清除现有实例中的累计运行时间。 Use the method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in an existing instance. > [!NOTE] > 刻度与不同。 ticks are different from . 值中的每个滴答都表示 1 100 毫微秒时间间隔。Each tick in the value represents one 100-nanosecond interval. 值中的每个计时周期表示除以1 秒的时间间隔。Each tick in the value represents the time interval equal to 1 second divided by the . ## Examples 下面的示例使用类来测量四个不同实现的性能, 用于分析字符串中的整数。The following example uses the class to measure the performance of four different implementations for parsing an integer from a string. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Frequency As Long

summary.span: 获取以每秒计时周期数表示的计时器频率。

span.span: Gets the frequency of the timer as the number of ticks per second.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 计时器频率指示计时器的精度和分辨率。The timer frequency indicates the timer precision and resolution. 例如, 计时器频率为2000000刻度每秒等于每个时钟周期500毫微秒的计时器分辨率。For example, a timer frequency of 2 million ticks per second equals a timer resolution of 500 nanoseconds per tick. 换而言之，由于一秒等于 10 亿个纳秒为单位，每秒 200 万个计时周期的计时器频率相当于每 10 亿的毫微秒，可以进一步简化为每 500 毫微秒 1 个时钟周期的 200 万个刻度。In other words, because one second equals 1 billion nanoseconds, a timer frequency of 2 million ticks per second is equivalent to 2 million ticks per 1 billion nanoseconds, which can be further simplified to 1 tick per 500 nanoseconds. 此值取决于基础计时机制的分辨率。The value depends on the resolution of the underlying timing mechanism. 如果安装的硬件和操作系统支持高分辨率性能计数器, 则该值反映了该计数器的频率。If the installed hardware and operating system support a high-resolution performance counter, then the value reflects the frequency of that counter. 否则, 值将基于系统计时器频率。Otherwise, the value is based on the system timer frequency. 由于频率取决于已安装的硬件和操作系统 , 因此在系统运行时, 该值保持不变。 Because the frequency depends on the installed hardware and operating system, the value remains constant while the system is running. ## Examples 下面的示例显示计时器的频率和分辨率。The following example displays the frequency and resolution of a timer. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#2)]

Public Shared Function GetTimestamp () As Long

summary.span: 获取计时器机制中的当前最小时间单位数。

span.span: Gets the current number of ticks in the timer mechanism.

returns.span: 一个长整型，表示基础计时器机制中的计时周期计数器值。

span.span: A long integer representing the tick counter value of the underlying timer mechanism.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果类使用高分辨率性能计数器, 则返回该计数器的当前值。 If the class uses a high-resolution performance counter, returns the current value of that counter. 如果类使用系统计时器, 则返回该实例的当前属性。 If the class uses the system timer, returns the current property of the instance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来更新性能计数器。The following example illustrates the use of the method to update a performance counter. [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime/CPP/elapsedtime.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime/CS/elapsedtime.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime/VB/elapsedtime.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly IsHighResolution As Boolean

summary.span: 指示计时器是否基于高分辨率性能计数器。

span.span: Indicates whether the timer is based on a high-resolution performance counter.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使用的计时器取决于系统硬件和操作系统。The timer used by the class depends on the system hardware and operating system. 如果计时器基于高分辨率性能计数器, 则为`true`。 is `true` if the timer is based on a high-resolution performance counter. 否则, 为`false` ,表示计时器基于系统计时器。Otherwise, is `false`, which indicates that the timer is based on the system timer. ## Examples 下面的示例显示计时器的频率和分辨率。The following example displays the frequency and resolution of a timer. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取一个指示 计时器是否在运行的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the timer is running.

value.span: 如果 实例当前正在运行，并且在对某个时间间隔的运行时间进行测量，则该值为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the instance is currently running and measuring elapsed time for an interval; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例通过调用或开始运行。 A instance begins running with a call to or . 实例通过调用或停止运行。The instance stops running with a call to or .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 停止时间间隔测量，并将运行时间重置为零。

span.span: Stops time interval measurement and resets the elapsed time to zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例计算并保留多个时间间隔内的累计运行时间, 直到重置实例。A instance calculates and retains the cumulative elapsed time across multiple time intervals, until the instance is reset. 使用可停止当前间隔度量并保留累计运行时间值。Use to stop the current interval measurement and retain the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用可停止正在进行的任何间隔测量, 并清除已用时间值。Use to stop any interval measurement in progress and clear the elapsed time value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Restart() cil managed

summary.span: 停止时间间隔测量，将运行时间重置为零，然后开始测量运行时间。

span.span: Stops time interval measurement, resets the elapsed time to zero, and starts measuring elapsed time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例计算并保留多个时间间隔内的累计运行时间, 直到重置或重新启动实例。A instance calculates and retains the cumulative elapsed time across multiple time intervals, until the instance is reset or restarted. 使用可停止当前间隔度量并保留累计运行时间值。Use to stop the current interval measurement and retain the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用可停止正在进行的任何间隔测量, 并清除已用时间值。Use to stop any interval measurement in progress and clear the elapsed time value. 用于停止当前间隔度量, 并启动新的间隔度量。Use to stop current interval measurement and start a new interval measurement.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Start() cil managed

summary.span: 开始或继续测量某个时间间隔的运行时间。

span.span: Starts, or resumes, measuring elapsed time for an interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在典型的方案中, 调用方法 , 最后调用方法, 然后使用属性检查运行时间。In a typical scenario, you call the method, then eventually call the method, and then you check elapsed time using the property. 启动后, 计时器会测量当前时间间隔 (处于已用计时器的刻度中), 直到实例停止或重置。Once started, a timer measures the current interval, in elapsed timer ticks, until the instance is stopped or reset. 启动已在运行的,不会更改计时器状态,也不会重置运行时间属性。Starting a that is already running does not change the timer state or reset the elapsed time properties. 实例测量多个间隔时, 方法将从当前运行时间值中恢复测量时间。 When a instance measures more than one interval, the method resumes measuring time from the current elapsed time value. 实例计算并保留多个时间间隔内的累计运行时间, 直到重置实例。A instance calculates and retains the cumulative elapsed time across multiple time intervals, until the instance is reset. 在调用之前使用方法, 以清除实例中的累计运行时间。Use the method before calling to clear the cumulative elapsed time in a instance. 使用方法和,只使用一个命令。 Use the method to and the with a single command. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来启动一个计时器, 用于测量应用程序的执行时间。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to start a timer that measures the execution time of an application. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch StartNew() cil managed
Public Shared Function StartNew () As Stopwatch

summary.span: 对新的 实例进行初始化，将运行时间属性设置为零，然后开始测量运行时间。

span.span: Initializes a new instance, sets the elapsed time property to zero, and starts measuring elapsed time.

returns.span: 刚刚开始测量运行时间的 。

span.span: A that has just begun measuring elapsed time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法等效于调用构造函数, 然后调用新的实例。This method is equivalent to calling the constructor and then calling on the new instance. ## Examples 下面的示例使用类来测量四个不同实现的性能, 用于分析字符串中的整数。The following example uses the class to measure the performance of four different implementations for parsing an integer from a string. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: 停止测量某个时间间隔的运行时间。

span.span: Stops measuring elapsed time for an interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在典型的方案中, 调用方法 , 最后调用方法, 然后使用属性检查运行时间。In a typical scenario, you call the method, then eventually call the method, and then you check elapsed time using the property. 方法结束当前时间间隔测量。The method ends the current time interval measurement. 停止未运行的不会更改计时器状态, 也不会重置运行时间属性。 Stopping a that is not running does not change the timer state or reset the elapsed time properties. 如果实例测量多个间隔, 则该方法等效于暂停经过的时间度量。 When a instance measures more than one interval, the method is equivalent to pausing the elapsed time measurement. 用于从当前运行时间值开始测量时间的后续调用。A subsequent call to resumes measuring time from the current elapsed time value. 使用方法可清除实例中的累计运行时间。 Use the method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in a instance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来停止测量应用程序的执行时间的计时器。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to stop a timer that measures the execution time of an application. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/VB/source.vb#1)]
